inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: between the ages of 21 to 60, inclusive

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Waist greater than 40 inches for men and 35 inches for women

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Weight has been stable for at least 6 months (no more than 5 pounds gained or lost)

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: For women of childbearing potential: subject must be willing to use acceptable form of contraception

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: She doesn't use any contraceptive methods for the past 4 months

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Her cardiac assessment is normal. Her joints and ROM are within  normal.

notes: Patient has weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She likes to try diets and exercise to lose weight.
